creator: wtff@freenet.de
text:
I downloaded the module jakarta-slide-ant-webdav-2.1b1
and looked into ant-webdav.html.
There it says that using the namespace syntax, the task names would be dav:put,
dav:get etc.

The antlib.xml file within the jar contains different tasknames: davget, davput
etc. So the examples from the ant-webdav.html will not work.

I like the shorter task names and therefore would like the andlib.xml file to be
updated rather than the ant-webdav.html.

Thanks

creator: luetzkendorf@apache.org
text:
I like the shorter task names too and have undone this accidental changes.
Regards, Stefan
